Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: SunilR
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel apartment 10 days 1 bed apartment 2 bed apartment due levels goodstaff helpful hotel called tulip creek hotel 24 hours super market called circle door hyper market day day 2 minutes walk deira city centre metro 3 minutes location perfect apartment courteous helpful paying internet chargeable complimentary wifi lobby restaurant internet charges restaurant complimentary breakfast challenge lack hotel administration able overcome negatives nice overall experience recommend property

Reviews.Title: “New name for hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jaydee231
Reviews.Content: star boutique called tulip creek apartment hotel management stayed time bed apartment spacious bathroom size balcony bed apartment unfortunately bed units front hotel sun balcony ideal facilities actual hotel breakfast average sufficient front desk staff helpful manager quickly sorted minor difficulties lack hot water short walk dubai city centre metro station couple minutes city centre mall supermarket close water snacks stay

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but not a four star by European standards”
Reviews.Author: Harper83
Reviews.Content: hotel manager told arrange complimentary airport pick pick instead free transfer airport rush time beside hotel staff friendly service minded europe rated star hotel star location hotel near deira city mall metro breakfast poor basic ketchup lucky fire alarm started times time midle night time continue sleeping recommend hotel sleep okay little expect star service

Reviews.Title: “Quality accommodation in a secluded location”
Reviews.Author: jazk
Reviews.Content: enjoyable stay star boutique hotel apartment onebedroom apartment luxuriously spacious tastefully decorated maintained ideal setting youre seeking discrete location usual tourist hotspots downside low profile taxi drivers unfamiliar property required navigational assistance

Reviews.Title: “HUGELY DISAPPOINTED - TRY DUSIT PRINCESS DUBAI, ITS BETTER AND COMES WITH FREE INTERNET”
Reviews.Author: Bunnies2405
Reviews.Content: 3rd time ive gotten star boutique 1st time impressive 2nd time little disappointed overall service cleaned etc 3rd time bad dont perks returning customers left ard 10am hang pls clean sign press cleaning button 330pm cleaned reception told shld hv informed reception cleaned left hotel gathered entire morning none housekeeping staff floor cleaning time extend stay offer unattractive rate bear mind internet doesnt free blessing disguised found princess dubai near city centre offering rate free internet 50 fb thrown am hotel service free internet times service matters remember treat loyal customers
